conversation.content: Um, are we really, you know, at the halfway point already? It's just that, well, it doesn't feel real.
Absolutely! We're at marker 250, which means, er, you've raised two hundred and fifty thousand dollars, and honestly, the crowd is going wild because this is incredible!
Wait, two hundred and fifty thousand? That can't be right.
It's completely right, and I mean, the board just updated—we're actually at 251 now, so, like, people are still donating as we speak!
This is [furious] insane! We only hoped for a hundred thousand!
I know, I know, and here comes marker 252—that's another thousand just in the last thirty seconds, and everyone here is just blown away by what you've accomplished!
How many people are watching right now?
Over twelve thousand viewers on the stream, and we just hit 253—seriously, the donation counter can barely keep up with how fast these numbers are climbing!
I can't believe this is happening.
Got it!
So, are we, uhh, on track to hit, I guess, our stretch goal? Actually, what even is our stretch goal at this point?
Well, the original stretch was 300k, but, um, we're at 254 now, and at this rate, basically, we might need to set a new one because you're crushing it!
I'm, err, getting really emotional here, you know, this is just... I mean, it's overwhelming.
Take your time, breathe—we're at 255 now, and every single dollar represents someone who believes in this cause, in what you're doing here today.
Can you tell me who some of the recent donors are?
Sure! We've got Sarah M. with fifty dollars at marker 256, and James from Portland with a hundred, and oh—huge one coming in—anonymous just dropped five thousand, bringing us to 261!
Anonymous [deep pitch] donors always make me wonder who they are.
Right? It's beautiful though—262 now—and whether they're public or private, every person here is part of something absolutely extraordinary that's changing lives.
How much time do we have left?
Just under two hours remaining, and, hmm, we're at 263—actually wait, 264—the thing is, at this pace, we might honestly break every record we've ever set!
